content:
alexcrichton opened PR #9167 from alexcrichton:update-spec-test-suite-submodule to bytecodealliance:main:

Mostly frobbing what features are active for spec tests and handling the fact that memory64 has been rebased on the 3.0 draft version which includes gc/function-references/exceptions/etc.
